I have never been more disappointed by something in my entire lifeğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡. All I wanted to do was support my friend Donny J Trump and this Great AmericağŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ he has created. This app has done everything but that. First of all, the app took a whole 24 hours to download- unacceptable. Then, I finally opened it and got the biggest surprise ever. The orange that I was eating jumped out of my hand, grew a face, and stared at me from my phone screen. What a shock! This scared me so much that it gave me a heart attack. I had to go to the hospital and pay a ridiculous medical bill that I can barely afford. Seems like Donny could have helped me a little with thatğŸ¤”ğŸ¤” After being released from the hospital, I decided to try the app one more time because I didnâ€™t want to give up trying to support my great president.
